sentence: Hamas spokesman to deliver response to state of the union.https://twitter.com/hollyotterbein/status/1496455601416814598\u00a0\u2026 — Josh Mandel (@Josh Mandel) 1645658514 Twitter was jolted into condemning Mandel's unprovoked post for being baselessly and unabashedly racist.
author: Brandon Gage
title: Josh Mandel tweets racist trope about Rashida Tlaib

sentence: The 2020 election “was stolen,” declared Josh Mandel, Republican candidate for U.S. Senate from Ohio, at CPAC 2022 on Friday, before telling the crowd that the Liz Cheneys and the Adam Kinzingers in the Republican Party “are traitors.” “We should abolish the January 6th Commission and replace it with a November 3rd Commission,” he declared.
author: Matt Margolis
title: U.S. Senate Candidate Josh Mandel Calls for J6 Commission to Be Abolished, Wants Commission on 2020 Election Instead

sentence: If Your Time is short Not a scrap of evidence has emerged to support Josh Mandel’s assertion of a stolen election.
author: Jon Greenberg
title: Ohio’s Josh Mandel repeats false claim of stolen 2020 election
